step.context: \text{Which of the following relationships between }\\ \sin x \text{ and } \cos x \text{ is more useful here ?}
\text{Hence, which of the following evaluates to } \\ I = \int e^x ( \sin x + \cos x) \, dx \text{ correctly ?}
step.reason: e^x ( \sin x + \cos x) \text{ matches the form } \\ e^x [\, f(x) + f'(x)\, ] \text{ only if }f(x) = \sin x \\ \text{Remember }\dfrac{d}{dx} \cos x = - \sin x \\ \text{ and thus, } f(x) \neq \cos x
